n: Blue Cheese, Avocado, and Grape Salad
des: "Tangy and sweet, the odd combination of foods in this salad tantalize the tastebuds! Try pineapple chunks and ranch dressing for another delicious combination."
ins: Divide the mixed salad greens between two large plates or bowls. Place half of the shredded cheese, grapes, and sliced avocado on each serving dish. Drizzle  blue cheese dressing on each salad.
